title: EUDI Wallet Trust Mark Information
description: Combines the information required for configuring EUDI Wallet Trust Mark in a certified Wallet Solution.

TrustMarkResourceURL.description: URL of the official EUDI Wallet Trust Mark graphics and User Info resources for rendering in the Wallet user interface.

ListOfCerfifiedWalletsURL.description: URL of the public list of certified EUDI Wallet Solutions in EU.

ListOfCerfifiedWalletsQRCode.description: QR Code containing the information of ListOfCertifiedWalletsURL.

WalletSolutionInfoPageURL.description: URL to the certified Wallet Solution's own information page under the list of certified EUDI Wallet Solutions page. Constructed from the ListOfCertifiedWalletsURL URL appended with a '?'+ the WalletSolutionID Identifier of the Wallet Solution.

WalletSolutionInfoPageQRCode.description: QR Code containing the information of WalletSolutionInfoPageURL.

WalletVerifierToolURL.description: URL pointing to the official EUDI Wallet Verification Tool's (an Attestation Provider Service) _/.well-known/openid-credential-issuer_ endpoint.
